Text.Page:
Comply with the officer's request and eliminate the monsters.
(Recommended for parties with 3 or more players.)

Do you remember this place?
The atmosphere has changed a lot since then.
I would like to get rid of the monsters to restore the original state.

We'll also start preparing to help you."Got it."

I knew I could count on you!

Thank you!
We're still a bit unprepared at the moment, but things will be better soon.

I will continue to reply on you in the future as well."I'll support you."
